title: Italian tomato and bread salad
ingredients: ['3/4 small loaf of country-style bread, 1-2 days old, cut or torn into bite-sized chunks', '1 yellow pepper, cut into chunks', '5 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '2 tbsp red wine vinegar', '1/2 tsp caster sugar', '1 small red onion, halved and thinly sliced', '450g juicy ripe plum tomatoes, roughly chopped', '2 tbsp capers, drained', '1 small bunch of fresh basil, about 20g, torn', '20 mini mozzarella cheeses, 225g total weight']
